entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
